restaurants.name: The Fat Duck
restaurants.description: The Fat Duck is a Michelin-starred restaurant in Bray, Berkshire, England. It is known for its innovative, multi-sensory approach to cooking and dining.

restaurants.name: El Celler de Can Roca
restaurants.description: El Celler de Can Roca is a three-Michelin-star restaurant in Girona, Catalonia, Spain. It is known for its creative and avant-garde cuisine.

restaurants.name: Noma
restaurants.description: Noma is a two-Michelin-star restaurant in Copenhagen, Denmark. It is known for its focus on foraging and using local and seasonal ingredients.

restaurants.name: Osteria Francescana
restaurants.description: Osteria Francescana is a three-Michelin-star restaurant in Modena, Italy. It is known for its contemporary Italian cuisine.

restaurants.name: Mirazur
restaurants.description: Mirazur is a three-Michelin-star restaurant in Menton, France. It is known for its inventive dishes that reflect the restaurant's location overlooking the Mediterranean Sea.

restaurants.name: Gaggan
restaurants.description: Gaggan is a Michelin-starred restaurant in Bangkok, Thailand. It is known for its progressive Indian cuisine.

restaurants.name: Central
restaurants.description: Central is a restaurant in Lima, Peru, run by chef Virgilio Martínez. It is known for its innovative use of Peruvian ingredients and its focus on biodiversity.

restaurants.name: Eleven Madison Park
restaurants.description: Eleven Madison Park is a three-Michelin-star restaurant in New York City, USA. It is known for its contemporary American cuisine.

restaurants.name: D.O.M.
restaurants.description: D.O.M. is a two-Michelin-star restaurant in São Paulo, Brazil. It is known for its modern Brazilian cuisine.

restaurants.name: Attica
restaurants.description: Attica is a restaurant in Melbourne, Australia, run by chef Ben Shewry. It is known for its innovative and seasonal tasting menus.
